actions.name: CreateSlackChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Slack channel configuration for your account

actions.name: DeleteAccountAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an alias from your account

actions.name: DeleteSlackChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Slack channel configuration from your account

actions.name: DeleteSlackWorkspaceConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Slack workspace configuration from your account

actions.name: GetAccountAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to get the alias for your account

actions.name: ListSlackChannelConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all Slack channel configurations for your account

actions.name: ListSlackWorkspaceConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all Slack workspace configurations for your account

actions.name: PutAccountAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update an alias for your account

actions.name: RegisterSlackWorkspaceForOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to register a Slack workspace for an AWS account that is part of an organization

actions.name: UpdateSlackChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update a Slack channel configuration for your account
